songs.title: Endless Abyss
songs.label: Sinners Production

lyrics.verse1:
The city bleeds neon, a sickly, pale glow
Reflecting the emptiness, where shadows grow
My pulse a dull echo, a rhythmic decay
Another night haunted, where demons hold sway
The taste of cold metal, a phantom on my tongue
A silent confession, a battle unsung.
lyrics.chorus:
The wires are frayed, a sparking, dark mess
Depression's a black hole, an endless abyss
PTSD's a wildfire, consuming the mind
Anxiety's a serpent, its coils tightly entwined
Heartbreak's a graveyard, where hope lies interred
A hollow existence, a life unheard.
lyrics.verse2:
The mirror reflects back, a stranger's cold stare
Eyes hollow and vacant, a burden to bear
Each breath a sharp razor, slicing through the air
A constant reminder, of all that's unfair
The whispers grow louder, they claw and they bite
Dragging me deeper, into the endless night.
lyrics.bridge:
There's no salvation, no light to be found
Just the crushing weight, of hallowed ground
The memories fester, a poisoned, dark seed
Planting despair, fulfilling a need
To sink into nothing, to simply erase
The pain of existence, the desolate space.
lyrics.verse3:
The walls are closing, the air grows so thin
A suffocating darkness, where shadows begin
To dance and to mock me, with cruel, twisted glee
A symphony of madness, eternally free
The weight of the world, a crushing embrace
Leaving me broken, without a trace.
lyrics.outro:
No light, no escape, just the endless descent
A final surrender, where life is misspent.
A silent departure, a fading away
Lost in the darkness, where shadows hold sway.

songs.description: A journey through the depths of depression and anxiety, exploring the dark corners of the mind.

songs.title: Shadow Realm
songs.label: Sinners Production

lyrics.verse1:
Step into the shadow realm, where nightmares become real
Where darkness has a presence that you actually can feel
The boundary blurs between what's true and what's pretend
A labyrinth of twisted thoughts that never seem to end
lyrics.chorus:
Shadow realm, shadow realm
Where the darkness comes alive
Shadow realm, shadow realm
Will I make it out alive?
lyrics.verse2:
Entities of darkness lurk beyond the veil of light
Whispering temptations in the silence of the night
I walk this path alone, no compass and no guide
Battling the demons that are raging deep inside
lyrics.bridge:
Lost between dimensions
Trapped between the worlds
Neither dead nor living
As the void unfurls
lyrics.verse3:
Each step I take is heavier, the air is thick with dread
The voices of the fallen echo loudly in my head
But somewhere in this darkness, there's a power to be found
Perhaps the only way out is to sink beneath the ground

songs.description: A haunting journey through the shadow realm, where reality blurs with nightmare.

songs.title: Midnight Vision
songs.label: Sinners Production
songs.description: Visions that appear only in the darkest hours, when the mind is most vulnerable.

songs.title: Crimson Tide
songs.label: Sinners Production
songs.description: A tidal wave of emotion crashes over you, painted in shades of crimson.

songs.title: Last Light
songs.label: Sinners Production
songs.description: The final glimmers of hope before darkness envelops everything.

songs.title: Fractured Mirrors
songs.label: Sinners Production

lyrics.verse1:
Staring into mirrors, fractured and cracked
A thousand reflections, distorted and hacked
Which one's real, which one's me?
They all look the same, yet different to me
lyrics.chorus:
Fractured mirrors show the truth
Broken pieces of a shattered youth
Which reflection is really you?
When every shard reflects something new
lyrics.verse2:
The masks I wear, layers so deep
Personas I've crafted, secrets I keep
Behind each reflection, a different face
Fragments of a soul lost in space
lyrics.bridge:
Put the pieces back together
But they never fit quite right
The cracks remain forever
Revealing what we hide
lyrics.verse3:
Splintered identity, scattered and strewn
Collect the fragments under the moon
Assemble the puzzle, but pieces are gone
Left with a portrait that's never quite done

songs.description: An exploration of fragmented identity and the masks we wear to hide our true selves.

songs.title: Ghost Town
songs.label: Sinners Production
songs.description: A meditation on isolation and abandonment in the midst of a crowded world.

songs.title: Demons Whisper
songs.label: Sinners Production
songs.description: The constant dialogue with the darker aspects of one's psyche.

songs.title: Echo Chamber
songs.label: Sinners Production
songs.description: Trapped in the repeating cycle of self-reinforcing thoughts and beliefs.

songs.title: Red Static
songs.label: Sinners Production
songs.description: The chaos and noise that fills the void between meaningful connections.

songs.title: Digital Void
songs.label: Sinners Production

lyrics.intro:
SIN: Lost in the binary, where existence blurs
Zeros and ones, that's all that occurs
KRYPT0: In this digital void, we're all just code
Fragment by fragment, our souls erode
lyrics.verse1:
SIN: Trapped in the system, a digital ghost
Disconnected from reality, what I fear the most
Scrolling through lives, none of them mine
Perfect curations that serve as a shrine
To the people we wish that we actually were
While our true selves fade into a digital blur
lyrics.chorus:
We're lost in the digital void
Human connection destroyed
Real life's the app we avoid
We're lost in the digital void
lyrics.verse2:
KRYPT0: Algorithm masters control what we see
Curating our thoughts, though we think we're free
Addicted to loops of endless content
Notifications pull us wherever we went
Blurred lines between what's real and what's fake
In this virtual world, what's truly at stake?
lyrics.bridge:
SIN: Can you feel me through the screen?
KRYPT0: Are we closer than we seem?
BOTH: Or just avatars in a broken dream?
lyrics.verse3:
SIN: Digital footprints that never fade
Permanent records of mistakes we've made
KRYPT0: Privacy's fiction in this new age
Our data's the product, we're locked in the cage
BOTH: But somewhere beneath all the noise and the haze
A human connection could still be salvaged

songs.description: A collaboration with underground artist KRYPT0 examining digital alienation and the loss of genuine human connection in the technological age.

albums.title: DARK MATTER
albums.label: Sinners Production
albums.description: A journey through beats and rhymes exploring the hidden forces that shape our universe.

albums.title: INNER DEMONS

albums.description: A deep dive into the psychological landscape of internal struggles and personal demons.

albums.title: STATIC
albums.label: Sinners Production
albums.description: A short, experimental release exploring themes of disconnection and digital noise.
